section.p:
This template represents the results of a laboratory, radiology, or other study performed on a patient.
The result observation includes a statusCode to allow recording the status of an observation. "Pending" results (e.g., a test has been run but results have not been reported yet) should be represented as "active" ActStatus.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7136, CONF:1198-9138, CONF:1198-32575 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-7140)
Note: Represents the biologically relevant time of the measurement (e.g., the time a blood pressure reading is obtained, the time the blood sample was obtained for a chemistry test).

contain zero or one [0..1] text
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-7133)
This code SHOULD be a code from the LOINC that identifies the result observation. If an appropriate LOINC code does not exist, then the local code for this result SHALL be sent (CONF:1098-19212).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1198-7143)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (CONF:1198-7147), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Observation Interpretation (HL7) DYNAMIC 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.78 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32476, DSTU:963)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-7149)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange such that it (CONF:1198-7150)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange such that it (CONF:1198-7151)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1198-32175)
SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:1198-7152)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"), the unit of measure SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-31484)
A coded value MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translations, which can be used to represent the original results as output by the lab (CONF:1198-31866)
If Observation/value is a CD (xsi:type="CD") the value SHOULD be SNOMED-CT (CONF:1198-32610)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Result Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7130, R2.1=CONF:1198-7130)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7131, R2.1=CONF:1198-7131)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Result ID) (CONF:7137, R2.1=CONF:1198-7137)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-7133)
This code SHOULD be a code from the LOINC that identifies the result observation. If an appropriate LOINC code does not exist, then the local code for this result SHALL be sent (CONF:1098-19212).

contain zero or one [0..1] text
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (Result Status) (CONF:7134, R2.1=CONF:1198-7134), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Result Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.39 STATIC 2013-08-09 (CONF:14849, R2.1=CONF:1198-14849)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-7140)
Note: Represents the biologically relevant time of the measurement (e.g., the time a blood pressure reading is obtained, the time the blood sample was obtained for a chemistry test).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1198-7143)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (CONF:1198-7147), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Observation Interpretation (HL7) DYNAMIC 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.78 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32476, DSTU:963)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7148, R2.1=CONF:1198-7148)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:7153, R2.1=CONF:1198-7153)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-7149)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange such that it (CONF:1198-7150)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange such that it (CONF:1198-7151)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1198-32175)
SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:1198-7152)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15924)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15925)
This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)

The value for 'code' in a result observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results are allowed. The Local and/or regional codes SHOULD be sent in the translation element. (CONF:7166)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange. Such referenceRanges, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange. This observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:7152)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:7149)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"), the unit of measure SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-31484)
A coded value MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translations, which can be used to represent the original results as output by the lab (CONF:1198-31866)
If Observation/value is a CD (xsi:type="CD") the value SHOULD be SNOMED-CT (CONF:1198-32610)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="322879048"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <methodCode code="593053286"/> <targetSiteCode code="1229760041"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="25825696"/> <code code="1352465442"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <referenceRange> <observationRange> <code code="1483786705"/> <text>Text Value</text> </observationRange> </referenceRange> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9138 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"
Consol Result Observation text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15924)
Consol Result Observation reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15925)
Consol Result Observation This reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15926)

Consol Result Observation The value for 'code' in a result observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results are allowed. The Local and/or regional codes SHOULD be sent in the translation element. (CONF:7166)

Consol Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] referenceRange. Such referenceRanges, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observationRange. This observationRange SHALL NOT contain [0..0] code (CONF:7152)
Consol Result Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] author (CONF:7149)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7130, R2.1=CONF:1198-7130)
Consol Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7131, R2.1=CONF:1198-7131)
Consol Result Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Result ID) (CONF:7137, R2.1=CONF:1198-7137)
Consol Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (Result Type) (CONF:7133, R2.1=CONF:1198-7133)
Consol Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7138)

Consol Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (Result Status) (CONF:7134, R2.1=CONF:1198-7134), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Result Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.39 STATIC 2013-08-09 (CONF:14849, R2.1=CONF:1198-14849)
Consol Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (Result Date/Time) (CONF:7140)
Consol Result Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (Result Value) (CONF:7143)
Consol Result Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] interpretationCode (Result Interpretation) (CONF:7147)
Consol Result Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7148, R2.1=CONF:1198-7148)
Consol Result Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:7153, R2.1=CONF:1198-7153)
